---
category: news
title: "When AI sees a man, it thinks “official.” A woman? “Smile”"
excerpt: "When US and European researchers fed pictures of members of Congress to Google’s cloud image recognition service, the service applied three times as many annotations related to physical appearance to photos of women as it did to men."
